text:
Created attachment 29892
fails

Based on the jmx attached:

1. With Delay Thread Startup checked and a variable used for duration - FAILS
2. Without Delay Thread Startup checked and the ${duration} variable used for duration - WORKS
3. With Delay Thread Startup checked but no variable used for duration - WORKS
